lom:description.lom:string: The website covers, with varying completeness, the different departments within the Geological and Planetary Sciences Division. Many of the subsections have interesting photographs and overview work being conducted by department faculty.
CalTech's Geological and Planetary Science Division's website. Overviews academic and research programs, student information, facilities & resources, people, news, and seminars.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Geology, Planetary, research, earth science, seismology
